lore: Aeolian gave Vortices great magical power, as well as the ability to change their size at will to be as small as a mouse or as large as an average human.\n\nThe Mana Vortex is a being of pure magic that has the ability to block any kind of spell, even from the most experienced spellcasters. During times of peace, they gather near magic towers, forming beautiful rings of light around them.
menagerieDialog: (It whirls around in circles, emitting a powerful light.)
(It whirs around the menagerie, annoying your other creatures who are trying to rest.)
(This creature's presence is particularly welcome in the stuffy confines of these castle walls.)
(It's starting to lose its luster - it might be time to feed it another Spell Gem.)
(This creature is surprisingly small when it's not wreaking havoc with its winds.)
name: Mana Vortex
